api_panel_md_curl_example:
<!--split-->

## Get records

```shell
curl "{{ apiBase }}/fusion/v1/datasheets/{{ datasheetId }}/records?viewId={{ viewId }}&fieldKey={{ fieldKey }}" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer {{ apiToken }}"

```

### Returned data example

```json

{{ response }}

```

### Other parameters and tips

  /**
   * ï¼ˆé€‰å¡«ï¼‰å¯¹æŒ‡å®šç»´æ ¼è¡¨çš„è®°å½•è¿›è¡Œæ’åºã€‚ç”±å¤šä¸ªâ€œæ’åºå¯¹è±¡â€ç»„æˆçš„æ•°ç»„ã€‚æ”¯æŒé¡ºåºï¼š'asc' å’Œ é€†åºï¼š'desc'ã€‚æ³¨ï¼šæ­¤å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šçš„æ’åºæ¡ä»¶å°†ä¼šè¦†ç›–è§†å›¾é‡Œçš„æ’åºæ¡ä»¶ã€‚

<!--split-->

## Add records
```shell
curl -X POST "{{ apiBase }}/fusion/v1/datasheets/{{ datasheetId }}/records?viewId={{ viewId }}&fieldKey={{ fieldKey }}"  \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer {{ apiToken }}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data '{
  "records": {{ records }},
  "fieldKey": "{{ fieldKey }}"
}'

```

### Returned data example

```json
{{ response }}
```

### Other parameters and tips

}'

## Upload attachments

```shell
curl -X POST "{{ apiBase }}/fusion/v1/datasheets/{{ datasheetId }}/attachments" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer {{ apiToken }}" \
  -H "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
  -F "file=@{ä½ çš„ æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„};"
```

robot_action_send_wework_config_1_desc: Specify a WeCom robot to send a message to the chat group it's in [How to get webhook](https://help.vika.cn/docs/guide/manual-automation-robot/actions/send-message-to-wecom)
test_function_modal_info_robot:
Vika Robots are the guardians for your work efficiency on the Vika Planet. Human beings are meant to do more creative things! View documentation

Example Robots:

  • Robot Alpha: When a record is created, Alpha will automatically send a message to the Slack channel
  • Robot Beta: When a specific form is submitted, Beta will automatically send a message to the Lark chat group
  • Robot Delta: when a record meets a specific condition, Delta will automatically update another record in another datasheet
robot_action_send_lark_config_1_desc: Specify a Lark robot to send a message to the chat group it's in [How to get webhook](https://help.vika.cn/docs/guide/manual-automation-robot/actions/send-message-to-lark)

last_modified_by_select_modal_desc: If any of the fields you select below are edited, the member  who edited most recently will show in the last edited by field
last_modified_time_select_modal_desc: If any of the fields you select below are edited, the most  recently edited time will show in the last edited time field
kanban_setting_tip: Only "Select" or "Member" fields can be  chosen as the grouping field
function_xor_summary: Returns true if an odd number of arguments are true.
function_or_summary: Returns true if any one of the arguments is true.
function_is_after_summary: Determines if [date1] is later than [date2]. Returns 1 if yes,  0 if no.
function_is_before_summary: Determines if [date1] is earlier than [date2]. Returns 1 if  yes, 0 if no.
function_is_same_summary: Compares two dates up to a unit and determines whether they  are identical. Returns 1 if yes, 0 if no.
function_example_usage:
Quoting the Column:  {Columns name} 
    Using operator: 2 * 5 
    Using function: AVERAGE({Number Columns 1}, {Number Columns 2}) 
    Using IF statement: IF(logical condition, "value 1", "value  2 ")
function_arrayunique_summary: Returns only unique items in the array.
function_and_summary: Returns true if all the arguments are true, returns false  otherwise.
function_arraycompact_summary: Removes empty strings and null values from the array. Keeps  "false" and strings that contain one or more blank characters.
function_arrayflatten_summary: Flattens the array by removing any array nesting. All items  become elements of a single array.
function_arrayjoin_summary: Join the array of rollup items into a string with a separator.
err_field_group_tip: Error found in field settings. Grouping does not work  temporarily.
rollup_field: Column referenced in the related datasheet
delete_field_tips_content: Are you sure you want to delete the "${field_title}"  field?
del_field_content: Are you sure you want to delete the "${fieldname}"  field?
err_filter_field: Can't add this field as a filter due to field configuration  errors
these_columns_you_chose_would_be_deleted: Your selected ${count} fields will be deleted
is_repeat_column_name: Please enter a unique field name
error_set_column_failed_duplicate_column: Failed to edit the field settings due to duplicate field names
function_last_modified_time_summary: Returns the date and time of the most recent modification made  by a user in a non-computed field in the table. If you only care about  changes made to specific fields, you can include one or more field names, and  the function will just return the date and time of the most recent change  made to any of the specified fields.
function_find_summary: Finds an occurrence of stringToFind in whereToSearch string  starting from an optional startFromPosition.(startFromPosition is 0 by  default.) If no occurrence of stringToFind is found, the result will be 0.
function_mid_summary: Extract a substring of count characters starting at  whereToStart.
function_replace_summary:
Replaces the number of  characters beginning with the start character with the replacement  text.
    (If you're looking for a way to find and replace all occurrences of  old_text with new_text, see SUBSTITUTE().)
function_search_summary:
Searches for an  occurrence of stringToFind in whereToSearch string starting from an optional  startFromPosition. (startFromPosition is 0 by default.) If no occurrence of  stringToFind is found, the result will be empty.
    Similar to FIND(), FIND() returns 0 rather than empty if no occurrence of  stringToFind is found.
function_substitute_summary:
Replaces occurrences of  old_text with new_text.
    You can optionally specify an index number (starting from 1) to replace  just a specific occurrence of old_text. If no index number is specified, then  all occurrences of old_text will be replaced.
function_t_summary: Returns the argument if it is text and blank otherwise.
error_set_column_failed_bad_property: Failed to set the properties of the column:Â  invalidate column property
error_group_failed_the_column_not_exist: Grouping failed: targeted column does not exist.
error_set_column_failed_no_support_unkno: Failed to set the properties of the column: modification of  unknown column is not recommended.
error_move_column_failed_invalid_params: Failed to move the column: parameter error.
space_setting_social_ad_decs: Certified current space will get a free 5G attachment storage package
client_meta_label_desc: vikadata - a data productivity platform that helps you manage your work data more efficiently
api_panel_md_python_example:
## Initialize SDK [![github]({{ githubIcon }})](https://github.com/vikadata/vika.py)

```python
from vika import Vika
vika = Vika("{{ apiToken }}")
datasheet = vika.datasheet("{{ datasheetId }}", field_key="{{ fieldKey }}")
```

{{ fieldNameTips }}
<!--split-->

## Get records

```python
# Returns all records
records = datasheet.records.all()
for record in records:
  print(record.json())

# Returns the records from a specific view
records_via_view = datasheet.records.all(viewId="{{ viewId }}")
# Get one record (if there are more than one records in the result, return the first record); It's recommended to get one record by its recordId.
one_record = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})
# Returns the records that matches the given condition. If you don't give any condition, it returns all records.
records = datasheet.records.filter({{ pyGetParams }})
```
<!--split-->

## Add records
```python
# Add one record
row = datasheet.records.create({{ addParams }})
# Add multiple records
records = datasheet.records.bulk_create({{  bulkAddParams }})

```
<!--split-->

## Update records
```python
row = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})

# Update one record
row.{{ oneFieldKey }} = {{ oneFieldValue }}
## row.save()

# Update multiple records
row.update({{ updateParams }})

```
<!--split-->

## Delete records
```python
record = datasheet.records.get({{ pyGetParams }})
# Delete one record
record.delete()
# Delete the records that matches a specific condition
datasheet.records.filter({{ pyGetParams }}).delete()
# Delete the records by recordIds
datasheet.delete_records({{ recordIds }})
```
<!--split-->

## Upload attachments

```python
_file = datasheet.upload_file(<local/web_filepath>)
record.{{ attachFieldName }} = [_file]
```

robot_trigger_record_matches_condition_c: Specify one datasheet: When a record in it matches condition, the robot starts running
robot_trigger_record_created_config_1_de: Specify one datasheet: When a record is created in it, the robot starts running
security_disabled_export_data: Prevent members from exporting datasheet or view
security_disabled_export_data_describle: All members cannot export datasheet or view data locally
select_wdget_Import_widget: Select a datasheet to import widget
select_widget_Import_widget: Import widget from the datasheet below
member_data_desc_of_appendix: All attachments uploaded to the Space are count in. You can't upload any files once the storage reaches its limit.
bind_resource: Select a datasheet to link to
single_record_member_mention: mentioned you at "" of the "" record in the "" datasheet.
field_set_you_by_user: mentioned you in of the "" datasheet.
single_record_comment_mentioned: mentioned you in the "" record of the "" datasheet.
comment_mentioned: mentioned you in comments from the "" datasheet.
datasheet_reach_limit: The number of datasheets in the "" Space has reached the limit.
api_panel_type_desc_member: Returns an array of unit objects. A unit describes the roles in a Space such as a member or a team. "type" has two values: Team or Member.
api_panel_type_desc_last_modified_by: Returns an array that contains one unit object. The unit is the last unit that modifies the record or the specified field(s).
api_panel_type_desc_created_by: Returns an array that contains one unit object. The unit is the member that creates the record.
tooltip_cannot_create_widget_from_dashbo: You can only create a widget from a datasheet rather than a dashboard
api_datasheet_not_exist: the specified datasheet does not exist
share_permisson_model_link_datasheet_lab: The current file (folder) is related with an external Datasheet
task_reminder: [Reminder] Your task "" in the datasheet "" will be due in
app_launch_guide_text_1: Thousands of members operate one datasheet at the same time, efficient real-time collaboration
move_node_modal_content: After moving, the visibility of the file may be affected by the parent folder. You can check the ${nodeSet} status for details
og_product_description_content: Vikadata, building block multimedia datasheet, pioneer of multidimensional tables technology, data sorting artifact, making everyone a data designer
og_keywords_content: Vikadata, vika, vikadata, big data, digitization, digital transformation, data center, business center, data assets, digital smart office, remote office, data workbench, blockchain, artificial intelligence, multidimensional tables, aPaaS, hpaPaaS, RAD, database applications, rapid development tools
initialization_failed_message: An error occurred while initializing data, please refresh the page, if you have questions, please scan the QR code on the right to add customer service, let us help you.
manage_role_header_desc: You can freely create roles and add any teams / members to one or more roles to achieve more flexible permission control Learn more
manage_role_empty_desc1: You can freely create roles and add any teams / members to one or more roles to achieve more flexible permission control. For details, please see the Learn more
password_not_identical_err: 'New password' and 'Confirm new password' must match
password_length_err: Password must be between 8 and 24 characters in length
login_frequent_operation_reminder_conten: You entered wrong account and password too frequently, please try again in 20 minutes
password_pattern_err: The password must include numbers and letters
placeholder_input_new_password_with_give: Enter a new password with 8-24 letters and numbers
obtain_verification_code: Verification code not obtained or expired
new_user_welcome_notify: Welcome to Vikadata. We have prepared a free meeting gift for you to learn vikadata. Click here to learn more.
field_map_tips_for_python:
A field name exists that does not match the variable rules, please turn on "Use FieldId" or the code example below may not work! 
[Field Mapping](https://github.com/vikadata/vika.py#%E5%AD%97%E6%AE%B5%E6%98%A0%E5%B0%84) can help you to solve this problem.
share_permisson_model_space_admin_tip: You can change the admin or add sub-admins
